languages.text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

traits.locale_text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}.

This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

languages.text: このクリーチャーは、腐敗した貴族からの被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が50%増加する。貴族の攻撃がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}が+10%になり、この効果は解除される。
languages.original_text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

traits.locale_text: この生物は貴族の優先ターゲットとなり、貴族の攻撃から受けるダメージはさらに＋50％増加する。貴族がターゲットに命中した場合、傷は10％回復し、この効果は解除される。

このクリーチャーは、腐敗した貴族からの被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が50%増加する。貴族の攻撃がターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}が+10%になり、この{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}は解除される。

languages.text: 此生物受到腐化贵族攻击时，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。如果腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}了目标，则会恢复10%的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除此效果。
languages.original_text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

traits.locale_text: 此生物为腐化贵族的优先目标，腐化贵族对此生物造成的伤害提高50%。如果腐化贵族命中了目标，则会恢复10%的生命值，并移除此效果。

此生物受到腐化贵族攻击时，承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高50%。如果腐化贵族{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}了目标，则会恢复10%的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，并移除此{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}。

languages.text: Esta criatura sufre +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} más de los ataques del noble corrupto. Si el noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a este objetivo, recupera +10 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} y elimina el efecto.
languages.original_text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura es objetivo prioritario para el noble corrupto y recibe un +50 % de daño adicional de sus ataques. Si el noble impacta al objetivo, recupera un 10 % de heridas y quita el efecto.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur erleidet +50 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch die Angriffe des verdorbene Adligen. Wenn der Adlige sein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhält er 10 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zurück und entfernt den Effekt.
languages.original_text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur ist ein Prioritätsziel für den verdorbenen Adligen und erleidet +50 % mehr Schaden durch seine Angriffe. Wenn der Adlige sein Ziel trifft, erhält er 10 % Wunden zurück und entfernt den Effekt.

languages.text: Cette créature subit 50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires lorsqu'il est ciblé par une attaque du noble corrompu. Si le noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} sa cible, il récupère 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} et retire cet effet.
languages.original_text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

traits.locale_text: Cette créature est une cible prioritaire du noble corrompu et elle subit +50 % de dégâts supplémentaires lors des attaques de celui-ci. Si le noble touche sa cible, il récupère 10 % de blessures et retire cet effet.

languages.text: Это существо получает на 50% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от атак оскверненного дворянина. Совершив {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по этой цели, дворянин восстанавливает себе 10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, после чего эффект снимается.
languages.original_text: This creature suffers +50% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the corrupted noble's attacks. If the noble {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} his target, he regains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} and removes the effect.

traits.locale_text: Это существо является приоритетной целью для оскверненного дворянина и получает на 50% больше урона от его атак. Совершив попадание по этой цели, дворянин восстанавливает себе 10% здоровья, после чего эффект снимается.

Это существо является приоритетной целью для оскверненного дворянина и получает на 50% больше урона от его атак. Совершив попадание по этой цели, дворянин восстанавливает себе 10% здоровья, после чего эффект снимается.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, yoz soylunun saldırılarından +%50 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır. Soylu, hedefine {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurursa{/g} +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı tazelenir ve bu etki de ortadan kalkar.
